participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Disciplined and straightforward, with a strong sense of duty.
participant_1.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Creative and imaginative, but struggles with anxiety and avoidance.
participant_2.background: i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.
